byline.original: By MATTHEW GOLDSTEIN and ALEXANDRA STEVENSON

lead_paragraph: The National Labor Relations Board had accused the firm, world’s largest hedge fund, of “restraining and coercing” employees from exercising their rights.
snippet: The National Labor Relations Board had accused the firm, world’s largest hedge fund, of “restraining and coercing” employees from exercising their rights....

headline.main: Hedge Fund Settlement With Labor Board on Worker Rights Stays Secret
headline.print_headline: Bridgewater Settlement With Labor Board on Worker Rights Stays a Secret
